title: Off With Their HEADS
body_text:
Over the years, the finale event of November has come to produce not only the finest in dodgeball action, but witness the emergence of some of even today's most gifted and feared talents. Thanks for Thanksgiving indeed!
DODGEBALL 15: November 26, 2005
The debuts of "PowerRanger" Matt Brown and future "Rimshot King" Ryan Letsche, the infamous Kristen Driscoll "V-Shot", and Tom Adams's narrow defeat of Kurt Gassner were just some of the highlights from
ECD's
first Thanksgiving weekend special.
DODGEBALL 65: November 25, 2006
A friendship divided when break-dancing Sascha Basista overcomes the forces of charismatic new-comer Joey Smalls during the string of
DarkDays
events.
DODGEBALL CX3: November 24, 2007
Pilgrims and Indians took center stage in 2007 when Team WALL obliterates Team ALL in the fourth of many confrontations.
From one colossal main event to another, DODGEBALL 166 will deliver the goods!
They've recked havoc for over three years and you can bet your a** they're a long way away from calling it quits. Arguably the game's most emulated figures epically collide once again on this special Thanksgiving '08 weekend. Iconic southpaw
Kevin Megill
takes on the mighty powerhouse
Chris Adams
in their explosive return battle from the
Season 13 Finale
back in March!
Brace yourself for this collision of superpowers! It all goes down November 29, with new
ECD
start time of
6:30
in effect!
body_html:
Over the years, the finale event of November has come to produce not only the finest in dodgeball action, but witness the emergence of some of even today's most gifted and feared talents. Thanks for Thanksgiving indeed!

DODGEBALL 15: November 26, 2005
The debuts of "PowerRanger" Matt Brown and future "Rimshot King" Ryan Letsche, the infamous Kristen Driscoll "V-Shot", and Tom Adams's narrow defeat of Kurt Gassner were just some of the highlights from ECD's first Thanksgiving weekend special.

DODGEBALL 65: November 25, 2006
A friendship divided when break-dancing Sascha Basista overcomes the forces of charismatic new-comer Joey Smalls during the string of DarkDays events.

DODGEBALL CX3: November 24, 2007
Pilgrims and Indians took center stage in 2007 when Team WALL obliterates Team ALL in the fourth of many confrontations.



From one colossal main event to another, DODGEBALL 166 will deliver the goods!

They've recked havoc for over three years and you can bet your a** they're a long way away from calling it quits. Arguably the game's most emulated figures epically collide once again on this special Thanksgiving '08 weekend. Iconic southpaw Kevin Megill takes on the mighty powerhouse Chris Adams in their explosive return battle from the Season 13 Finale back in March!

Brace yourself for this collision of superpowers! It all goes down November 29, with new ECD start time of 6:30 in effect!
